code: import axios from'axios';const API_BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL||'/api';const api=axios.create({baseURL:API_BASE_URL,headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});api.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');if(token){config.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);}return config;});api.interceptors.response.use(response=>response,error=>{if(error.response&&error.response.status===401){localStorage.removeItem('token');localStorage.removeItem('user');window.location.href='/mohit/login';}return Promise.reject(error);});export default api;
